meta.title: Meta-Governance Framework - Coordinated Global Governance
meta.description: Comprehensive framework for coordinated global governance systems enabling planetary-scale decision-making while preserving local autonomy and democratic participation

intro.title: Meta-Governance Framework
intro.paragraph1: The Meta-Governance Framework provides comprehensive principles and mechanisms for coordinated global governance that preserves local autonomy while enabling planetary-scale coordination.
intro.paragraph2: This framework addresses the critical challenge of our time: how to govern effectively at a planetary scale while maintaining democratic participation, cultural diversity, and local self-determination.

guides.title: Quick Start
guides.description: 5-minute overview of meta-governance principles and implementation

guides.title: Introduction
guides.description: Deep dive into the foundations of coordinated global governance
